item.title: Configuring OVS-DPDK with VM
item.description: Recently, I work on a performance comparison between virtualization technologies. In order to made an experiment I had had to setup a test environment based on OVS-DPDK and KVM-based Virtual Machine. This user guide shows how to install and configure the test scenario with OVS-DPDK and libvirt. The test scenario is presented below. According to OVS flow rules configuration we can test PHY-OVS-PHY scenario (green line) or PHY-VM-PHY scenario (red line).
